description:
Free Photo HEIC to JPEG Conversion Tool

iMazing HEIC converter is a free Mac and PC app which converts photos from HEIC to JPEG or PNG.
- Convert HEVC/HEIF (H.265) videos to MPEG-4 (H.264)
- Customize compression/quality ratio of MPEG-4 (H.264) output
- Customize resolution ratio of MPEG-4 (H.264) output
- Customize resolution ratio of JPEG output
